title: Just Your Teams
description: A sports news site that shows news only relevant to a sports team you select! The backend is powered by the powerful SportsRadar API so there is so much room to grow beyond its current state. The one I am most proud of!

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A web app that allows you to input a workout. A great example of how powerful MongoDb is, by adding data fields for only when a page needs it. It records the day you worked out, each exercise and it's stats!

title: Coin Finder
description: An app that utilizes foundation, Google Maps API, Google GeoLocation API and CoinMap API. Vendors who accept cryptocurrency in your search area will be displayed. My first real project I ever worked on!

title: Daily Planner
description: A simple daily planner that updates visually based on the time. It uses local storage to save your tasks that you input, the color will update depending on the time of day, and you can easily save or edit tasks.
